thread.title: The world rejects Rita’s Lady Marmalade remake
thread.title_full: The world rejects Rita’s Lady Marmalade remake

title: The world rejects Rita’s Lady Marmalade remake
text:
Rita Ora’s idea for a Lady Marmalade remake is being slammed by everyone news.com.au Rita Ora’s idea for a Lady Marmalade remake is being slammed by everyone news.com.au Rita Ora’s idea for a Lady Marmalade remake is being slammed by everyone - even Iggy. 
THE world has collectively rejected Rita Ora’s idea to remake the classic hit “Lady Marmalade”. 
In a recent interview with The Sun , Ora declared she’d love to assemble a few of her pop star mates to remake Labelle’s 1975 soul classic. 
Of course, this wouldn’t be the first reworking of the hit. Christina Aguilera, Pink, Lil’ Kim, Mya, and Missy Elliot teamed up for the song in 2001 for the flick Moulin Rouge! 
Ora’s dream team? Miley Cyrus, Charlie XCX and Iggy Azalea. 
But it turns out the universe believes perfection was achieved in 2001 and people on social media were quick to smack down this new proposal. 
The hate got so bad even Iggy took to Twitter to wash her hands of the issue and let everyone know she had nothing to do with the idea. Other Stories
